org.epochx.stats
Class StatsEngine

java.lang.Object
  org.epochx.stats.StatsEngine
Direct Known Subclasses:
GEStatsEngine, GPStatsEngine, GRStatsEngine
public class StatsEngine
extends java.lang.Object

Generates statistics about evolutionary events.

A StatsEngine is plugged into StatsManager instances to generate those statistics that are requested from the StatsManager. When a statistic is calculated it may be dependant upon other statistic fields which will be requested from the StatsManager and may in turn be generated by this class.

Constructor Summary
StatsEngine(Model model)
          Constructs a StatsEngine to generate statistics on request.

Method Detail

getRunStat

public java.lang.Object getRunStat(java.lang.String field)
Calculates and returns the run statistic associated with the given field provided as an argument.

Parameters:
field - an identifying string for the run statistic being requested.
Returns:
an Object which is the statistic requested or null if the statistic cannot be generated by this stats engine.
